short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add more styles to web pages to make them looks better!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension add code highlight, click to copy, styles to www.tldp.org documents, it was originally created to be used with the famous Advanced Bash-Scripting Guide online html version (aka abs, http://tldp.org/LDP/abs/html/index.html) by Mendel Cooper.
